main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) reported in Binghamton, New York, during July 1964.
interesting points: The sightings included descriptions of various shapes, sizes, and colors of objects,Some witnesses reported seeing bright, pulsating lights in the sky,One object was reported to be larger than 25 feet and emitted a luminous ring,Observers were able to track some objects for several minutes before they disappeared,The investigation by Air Force officers found no satisfactory explanation for these sightings.
sighted object: Round and oval unidentified flying objects emitting lights
witness description: Residents including students, firemen, and other citizens
